item.title: Blocked drain., 29th August
item.description:
In front of the hotel's Art Café, a drain became clogged and water overflowed, making it difficult for people to walk along the sidewalk to the cafe's entrance. The drain has been blocked for over a week. Please arrange for an inspector or specialist to investigate. Thank you in advance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Street, Mayfair, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish and filth from New Green Supermarket, 29th August
item.description:
New Green Supermarket piles its rubbish on the pavement throughout the day, not in bags or bins. It is collected but because it’s not in bags lots of mess is left and flys down the street. The pavement is filthy. It’s a daily problem.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins left on pavement for weeks, 29th August
item.description:
These residential bins have been left on the pavement outside 98 a green lanes on Springdale Road. They attract fly dipping and general rubbish which is a major problem this end of the road. Can they be removed please. Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springdale Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Poor management of waste services, 29th August
item.description:
The waste services department at Enfiekd council needs to be put in special measures . I have reported this dumped bin on hoppers road n21 by downes court a week ago . It still remains uncollected and now serving as an unsightly impromptu second bin full of waste and flies .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodland Way, Palmers Green, London

item.title: Human, white van man, noise 1am, 29th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lumley Street, Mayfair, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple street lights not working between 1 - 38 Bromley gardens on the same side of the road it, 29th August
item.description:
Multiple street lights not working between 1 - 38 on the same side of the road it Is becoming dangerous to walk out at night as there have been mysterious individuals leaking feels unsafe and it is very dark when coming in late my children are all scared it has been like this for around 4 weeks and problem still has not been fixed. Please help urgently thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Gardens, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
